roleset.name: to gain control of

role.descr: entity conquered, spoils (if unclear whether the spoils or the loser, use this arg)
defeated entity; loser; former owner of arg1

example.name: transitive
example.text: [Japanese chemical companies]-1 are at work [*-1]-2 developing their own substitutes and hoping [*-2] to conquer new markets , of course .

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: By 1673 they had completed their conquest of China, though they continued to expand well into the next century

example.name: args 1,2
example.text: Victor Emmanuel II of Italy enters Rome after its conquest from the Papal States.

roleset.note:
CONQUER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'conquer' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from conquer.01-v predicate notes)
CONQUERING-N NOTES: Automatically added alias.
CONQUEST-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Relation to reconquest.01. (from conquest.01-n)
